availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert D. Kemper (Owen County, Kentucky and Carroll County, Kentucky, farmer. )

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky and Carroll County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Tillman H. Kemper and Dorcas Kemper. Married Margaret Ann Montgomery Kemper in Owen County, Kentucky on September 22, 1852. Father of Mary E. Kemper, John Kemper, Willard Kemper, and Robert Kemper. Farmer in Carroll County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Owen County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, City/District, p. 185B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 2, p. 281.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Owen County Marriages, Film #000272769, p. 306 of 326.
Find A Grave, "Robert Dillon Kemper (19 May 1832-12 Dec 1893)," Memorial #31689592, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/31689592(accessed June X, 2020).
